title: Weddings
subtitle: Create your dream wedding by the sea
intro: Mollösunds Wärdshus offers a unique and romantic setting for your special day. With stunning views of the sea and a charming historic building, we provide the perfect backdrop for your wedding.

packages.title: Wedding Packages
packages.description: We offer a range of wedding packages to suit your needs and budget.
packages.custom: We can also create a custom package tailored to your specific requirements.

venues.title: Wedding Venues
venues.description: Choose from our beautiful indoor and outdoor venues for your ceremony and reception.
venues.indoor: Our indoor venue can accommodate up to 80 guests.
venues.outdoor: Our outdoor venue offers stunning views of the sea and can accommodate up to 120 guests.

food.title: Wedding Menu
food.description: Our chef will work with you to create a custom menu for your wedding day.
food.options: We offer a range of options from buffet-style to plated dinners.

accommodation.title: Accommodation
accommodation.description: We have 10 beautifully decorated rooms for you and your guests.
accommodation.note: Special rates are available for wedding guests.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For more information or to book your wedding, please contact us at:

builder.title: Wedding Builder
builder.description: Use our interactive wedding builder to create your own custom package. Choose your date, number of guests, and customize with add-ons that suit your needs.
